    • Method Detail

      • addNewUser

        public static boolean addNewUser(User newUser)
        Used to create a new user in the database from a User object.
        Parameters:
        newUser - a User object
        Returns:
        Returns false if the new user's email or telephone number already exists in the database, if else true

      • userExist

        public static boolean userExist(String email,
                                String telephone)
        Checks if a an email or a telephone number already exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        email - The email that you want to check if exists
        telephone - The telephone number that you want to check if exists
        Returns:
        Returns true if the telephone number or the email already exists and false if not

      • getUser

        public static User getUser(int userId)
        Get a user from a user ID.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID
        Returns:
        a User object, or null if a user with the given ID doesn't exist.

      • updateUser

        public static boolean updateUser(int id,
                                 String newEmail,
                                 String newTelephone,
                                 String newName,
                                 String bio,
                                 String relationship,
                                 String gender,
                                 String image)
        Used to update email, name and the telephone of a user based on email. Returns false if the user does not exist and true if the update was successful.
        Parameters:
        id - The user's id in the database
        newEmail - New email
        newTelephone - new Telephone number
        newName - new Name
        bio - a String object.
        relationship - a String object.
        gender - a String object.
        image - a String object.
        Returns:
        True or false depending on success.

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser(int id)
        Used to delete users from the database based on the users email.
        Parameters:
        id - The user's id

      • resetPassword

        public static boolean resetPassword(String email)
        Used to reset a user's password when forgot. Takes the user's email, and generates a random password that gets sent to the user's email. A hashed version of the new password is inserted to the database.
        Parameters:
        email - The email of the user who's password is going to be reset.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the password was successfully reset. Returns false if the email is non existent. in the database.

      • updatePassword

        public static boolean updatePassword(int id,
                                     String newPassword)
        Used to update a user's password based on the his/hers email.
        Parameters:
        id - The user's id
        newPassword - The new password that the user wants
        Returns:
        False if the user does not exist and true if successful.

      • getHouseholds

        public static ArrayList<Household> getHouseholds(int userId)
        Used to get all the Households that a user is connected to
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Household objects

      • getChores

        public static ArrayList<Chore> getChores(int userId)
        Used to get a user's tasks based on the user's id
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of todo objects

      • getPasswordMatch

        public static boolean getPasswordMatch(int id,
                                       String password)
        Method for checking if current password is correct, when changing password
        Parameters:
        id - the user id
        password - a String object.
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if the password is correct, else false.

      • isAdmin

        public static boolean isAdmin(int houseId,
                              int userId)
        Used to find out if a user is a admin of a given household
        Parameters:
        houseId - the house ID
        userId - the user ID
        Returns:
        true if the user is an admin of the household or false if the user isn't
